short.value: A specimen collected from a patient for the purposes of a diagnostic investigation

definition.value: A sample collected from a patient for the purposes of a diagnostic investigation.

human.value: The specimen shall at least have a valid identifier or method or type

expression.value: type.exists() or collection.method.exists() or identifier.where(system.count() + value.count() >1).exists() or accessionIdentifier.where(system.count() + value.count() >1).exists()

xpath.value: exists(f:type) or exists(f:collection/f:method) or exists(f:identifier) or exists(f:accessionIdentifier)

human.value: If a coded body site is provided, at least one code shall be from SNOMED CT
